text: Accrington Stanley Football Club is an English football club. The club will play in League Two (the English fourth division) in the 2015/16 season. They were re-founded in 1968 after going bankrupt (having no money) in 1962. They were first founded in 1921. They are thought of a hard working club but having no chance of success. Their nickname is Stanley. They play at the Wham Stadium in Accrington in Lancashire, in England. Category:English football clubs Category:1921 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1962 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:1968 establishments in England Category:1920s establishments in England Category:1960s disestablishments in England
title: Accrington Stanley F.C.
